job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., * Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI/UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Sr. Software Engineer

This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., * Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI/UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building AI-centric products, utilizing generative AI, LLMs, RAG, and agents. While it mentions full-stack development, the core focus is on integrating and developing applications around generative AI technologies, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to understand business needs and how new features (especially AI-centric ones) impact existing systems and teams.

phrases: Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
job_tasks.justification: The explicit mention of generative AI, LLMs, RAG, and agents points directly to the core of generative AI modeling and application development.

phrases: Full Stack Sr. Software Engineer
collaborate to build new AI centric products
guide new features
design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
APIs GraphQL, REST
React UI/UX
Python, JavaScript, Node.js
job_tasks.justification: This role is explicitly for a Full Stack Software Engineer, involving the design, development, and maintenance of systems, including building user-facing products and APIs.

phrases: Docker, Kubernetes
Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
job_tasks.justification: The mention of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) suggests involvement in deploying and managing AI systems in production environments.
